title: The Story of the Southern Cross: an Australian Aboriginal legend
creator_credit: Concept Films of Australia, Pilgrim Films and Thelma Dufton
brief_description: Using drawings, tells the story of the origin of the Southern Cross. Adapted from an Aboriginal legend by Marcia Hatfield. Narration by Ron Haddrick.
